bug.author: knyghty
bug.description:
Downloaded a word2vec model from here: <denchmark-link:http://www.fredericgodin.com/software/>http://www.fredericgodin.com/software/</denchmark-link>
I followed the tutorial here: <denchmark-link:https://spacy.io/docs/tutorials/load-new-word-vectors>https://spacy.io/docs/tutorials/load-new-word-vectors</denchmark-link>
Now it seems to work, as in, when I do doc1.similarity(doc2) I get different results from before, but I'm a bit confused why it returns 0 instead of some number?

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
